World Link Sucks!  I have been using World Link services for more than two years now. But, after I shifted to 6mbps unlimited plan, World Link showed it true fraudulent colors!  What is Unlimited? Unlimited means ‘unlimited’, plain and simple! But, in World Link’s dictionary, Unlimited means Limited, just like volume based plans. If u use internet a bit more than average users, then RIP your high-speed internet experience (which is already way slower than they claim) because they will throttle your internet speed! If unlimited connection is a limited connection with fallback speed, why would I choose unlimited plan? I would certainly choose Volume Based Service!  In its website and advertising, World Link never mentions that unlimited is not really unlimited! So, since they deceive users into taking this expensive plan without mentioning their fraudulent policy, known as Fair User Policy (FUP), which, without mentioning any details tells that “IF you use too much internet, we will throttle your internet speed”. How much is too much? What volume of use is too much? Nothing is mentioned. It simply means, pay for unlimited plans, but don’t use unlimited, always be limited with your use! It is like a King announcing to his people – “You have the complete democracy, but you can do only what I allow you to do!”  I have 45 days left in my 3 months plan, and they have completely crippled my bandwidth! When asked, they told I used more that a certain volume. Shame on you, World Link! I have lost all my faith and trust on this fraudulent ISP. I will be dumping its crappy service once this contract is over. Well, it might sound like cheap move if I request people to stop using World Link Unlimited Service, but at least, as an aware costumer, I would like to inform this in public interest that the World Link Unlimited Connection is just a limited plan with higher price! So, consider this before your connect to them!
